name: BAL VIKAS EVAM MAHILA UTTHAN SANSTHAN
briefDescription: BAL VIKAS EVAM MAHILA UTTHAN SANSTHAN LOCATED IN BASTI, UTTAR PRADESH.In the year 2000 some excited youth of  Basti district, who were inspired by the Neta ji Subash Chandra Bose thoughts, by the national expectations as for developing healthy  education , self depend society for making social equality with in poor & harassed women , men & children,  they established Bal Vikas Evam Mahila Utthan Sansthan.The organization needed human resource & self helped people for completing its objectives presently in the organization there are total 50 unpaid worker in which 35 women & 15 men for adding the organization in the currents of development the organization is running the program on many subject as community based organization making training, women empowerment, health, agriculture, environment etc.
